{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3331566,"name":"","username":"Ishan1","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/439d5e/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-12T21:28:36.549Z","cooked":"

Hello,

When flashing the new Limelight 3G with Balena Etcher, the limelight doesn’t show up to be imaged. How can we solve this?

Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":9,"updated_at":"2024-03-12T21:28:36.549Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":283,"reads":365,"readers_count":364,"score":1488.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":458443,"topic_slug":"cant-flash-limelight-3g","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":56221,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4829 | Director of Software"},"post_url":"/t/cant-flash-limelight-3g/458443/1","custom_user_title":"4829 | Director of Software","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3331577,"name":"Kevin Hjelstrom","username":"KH987","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kh987/{size}/182255_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-12T21:34:31.243Z","cooked":"

Do you have the USB drivers from the downloads page?

Limelight Vision

Downloads

Limelight Hardware Manager Limelight Hardware Manager 1.3 Bonjour (For stable networking on Windows): Bonjour Download USB Drivers USB Flash Driver Download Flash Tool (Etcher 1.14.3 required for LL3):  For Windows For MacOS 1.14.3 1.14.3  Etcher...

If you do have them installed, try a different cable. Some USB C cables only charge and don’t transfer data.

We downloaded the USB drivers and tried 3 different cables (two of which we use to connect to our Xbox controllers) and the boot module still didn’t show up.

docs.limelightvision.io

Updating LimelightOS | Limelight Documentation

Follow this guide to update your Limelight Smart Camera to the latest version of LimelightOS.

100% on me for not making this more obvious - for 3G, you need to hold the button before inserting the USB cable. Your 3G is already flashed with 2024.2!
